jip riye athi kapat ha malasirura pilissu sthanaye thibi hamu wu kapat kaballa ekama wargaye eewa bawatada polisiya handunagena atha.miyagiya disanayaka yana aya 25 wanida ude aniyam biriyage niwase sita jip riyen dahawal kamata ena bawa kiya pitawa gos athi athara, edina rathriye ho yali niwasata nopaminima nisa aniyam biriya 26 wanida ude padukka polisiye paminillak kara athi bawada heliwi atha.me athara miyagiya aya edina dahawal homagama nagaraye ha paswaruwe kirindiwala pradeshaye siti bawatada polisiyata thorathuru labi athi athara ee pilibandawada awadhanaya yomu kirimata polisiya piyawara gena atha.ohu edina panagoda yuda hamuda kandawurata yana bawa kiya athayi kiyana siddhiyak pilibandawada thorathuru helikara ganimata polisiya piyawara ganimin siti.polisiyata idiripathwa athi biriyan dedenagen prakasha satahankota adhikaranayata karunu wartha kara gampaha maha rohaledi pashchath marana parikshanaya pawathwimen anathuruwa nithyanukula biriyata dehaya baradimata piyawara ganna lesa aththanagalla sahakara polis adhikari jayantha pushpakumara mahatha mirigama wadabalana polis sthanadhipathi pradhana polis parikshaka ee.
